game.name: Rapunzel And Belle Shopping
game.description:
Cute princess Belle has received a message from Rapunzel asking her to shop for some desirable clothes. Both the princesses find some spare time to visit the nearest mall to enjoy a wonderful shopping experience. But, they need your help at the mall. Do you like to support both of them and have fun? Join Rapunzel And Belle Shopping game and be prepared to help the princesses buy the fashionable and trendy clothes and accessories! Try your best fashion skills to make them look gorgeous!

Firstly, choose the princess you want to shop with before doing anything else in this brand new dressing game for girls. In mom outfit store, you can explore different kinds of shaded and ripped jeans and combine them with some colorful tops. You can also purchase a long dress for the pregnant princesses and make her look comfortable. Remember you would have only a cash of $1000 to be used for each princess. Then take them to the store of Hairstyles & Shoes for Moms.

At the second store, they will have a wide arrange of elegant hairstyles, as well as handbags and a pair of matching shoes to choose from. Mix and match as many dresses and accessories you see on the stores to create the awesome results for the both princesses in this one of the best html5 shopping games for kids! We through atmegame.com are guaranteed to offer the best possible fun at a single place, no download required.
